# [Interview #1071: WoR Signing Report - Pinpoint, Entry #1](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1071#1)

#### Pinpoint

Can Shardblades kill spren?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Theoretically, yes.
